title: Frontend Developer
description:
Role: Frontend Developer
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Experience: 0–1 years
 



 Compensation: ₹12\\-15 LPA
 



 Company: GoodSpace AI
 



  





 About GoodSpace AI:
 



  





 GoodSpace AI is an AI\\-powered hiring platform helping job seekers find jobs faster and companies hire pre\\-screened, AI\\-interviewed candidates within 24 hours. As we scale, we’re looking for a skilled Frontend Developer to help build world\\-class user experiences for millions of job seekers.
 



  





 Role Overview
 



  





 We are hiring a Frontend Developer who is passionate about creating clean, fast, and intuitive UI. You will work closely with the product, backend, and design teams to deliver high\\-quality web and app experiences using modern frontend technologies.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities
 



  





 Develop responsive, high\\-performance UI for web and mobile interfaces.
 



  





 Convert UI/UX designs from Figma into functional, pixel\\-perfect components.
 



  





 Build reusable, modular, and scalable frontend components.
 



  





 Optimize application performance and page load times.
 



  





 Collaborate with backend engineers to integrate REST APIs and GraphQL (if applicable).
 



  





 Ensure cross\\-browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness.
 



  





 Maintain code quality through proper testing and best practices.
 



  





 Stay updated with the latest frontend trends and tools.
 



  





 Required Skills \\& Experience
 



  





 1–4 years of experience in frontend development.
 



  





 Strong proficiency in React.js / Next.js (preferred stack).
 



  





 Good knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (ES6\\+).
 



  





 Experience with state management: Redux / Zustand / Context API.
 



  





 Familiarity with TailwindCSS, Material UI, or similar UI libraries.
 



  





 Experience integrating APIs and working with JSON.
 



  





 Understanding of performance optimization and frontend debugging.
 



  





 Ability to write clean, modular, and maintainable code.
 



  





 Nice\\-to\\-Have Skills
 



  





 Experience with TypeScript.
 



  





 Familiarity with React Native (big plus).
 



  





 Knowledge of SEO, SSR, and SSG in Next.js.
 



  





 Experience with version control: Git/GitHub.
 



  





 Basic understanding of backend or cloud services (Node.js, Firebase, AWS).
 



  





 What We Offer
 



  





 Opportunity to build products impacting millions of job seekers.
 



  





 Fast\\-paced, high\\-growth startup environment.
 



  





 Flexible work culture and high ownership.
 



  





 Work directly with the founding team on core projects.
 



  





 Freedom to explore new technologies and tools.

title: Python - Backend Engineer
description:
**Location** 
 : Kolkata, India (In\\-office)
   

  

**Type** 
 : Full\\-time
   

  

**Experience** 
 : 2 to 4 years
   

  

**About The Client**
 Our client is building a next\\-generation platform to power
 **preschools of the future** 
 combining powerful tools for curriculum planning, classroom journaling, communication, and AI\\-driven insights — all designed to elevate the preschool experience for educators, parents, and school leaders. Built for
 **web, iOS, and Android** 
 , it blends world\\-class engineering with deep domain expertise in early childhood education. We're already trusted by forward\\-thinking preschools across India and globally, and are just getting started.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We're looking for a seasoned
 **Python backend engineer** 
 to join our core engineering team at Agastya – a next\\-gen EdTech SaaS for preschools. You’ll work closely with the founders and product teams to build scalable, fast, and secure backend services – and power the AI\\-enabled features that are core to our platform.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Architect and maintain microservices using Flask and FastAPI
* Design performant, secure, and well\\-documented APIs
* Optimize systems for scalability and low latency
* Work with GCP services (Cloud Run, Cloud Storage, Firestore, IAM, etc.
* Maintain existing CI/CD pipelines and observability tools (Sentry, logging, etc.)
* Collaborate with mobile/web engineers for full\\-stack delivery
* Support deployment and scaling of AI/ML features and services.


**Requirements**
* 2 to 4 years of backend development experience in Python
* Familiar with AI tools and IDEs like Cursor, Claude Code, etc.
* Deep expertise in Flask and FastAPI frameworks
* Expert in api design and implementation and scaling systems.
* Hands\\-on experience with Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
* Strong understanding of performance optimization and async programming
* Experience with NoSQL databases like MongoDB or Firestore
* Comfortable with Docker and GitHub Actions
* Startup mindset: proactive, execution\\-oriented, and quality\\-driven


**Bonus / Preferred**
* Familiarity with foundation model APIs and tools like OpenAI, CoreWeave, Pinecone, LangChain, etc.
* Preferably from any of the Tier 1 colleges with a working exposure in startups.
* Exposure to building or integrating AI\\-driven features in production apps.


 Skills: python,aws,coreweave,pincecone,flask,backend development,mongodb,firestore,openai,docker,langchain,fastapi,gcp,github

title: Engineer Software
description:
Our vision for the future is based on the idea that transforming financial lives starts by giving our people the freedom to transform their own. We have a flexible work environment, and fluid career paths. We not only encourage but celebrate internal mobility. We also recognize the importance of purpose, well\\-being, and work\\-life balance. Within Empower and our communities, we work hard to create a welcoming and inclusive environment, and our associates dedicate thousands of hours to volunteering for causes that matter most to them.
   

  

 Chart your own path and grow your career while helping more customers achieve financial freedom. Empower Yourself.
   

  

 2\\- 6 years of hands\\-on technology experience with the ability twork in teams spread out in multiple locations.
   

  

 A minimum of 2 \\- 6 years of hands\\-on experience on Pro\\*C,PL/SQL,Oracle SQL,UNIX (Solaris) and Java programming language.
   

  

 Degree in Computer Science or Information Systems, or equivalent applicable work experience
   

  

 Enthusiasm to work and learn in a team environment.
   

  

 Ability to work on a task independently with minimal supervision.
   

  

 Team player with experience of working in teams spread in multiple locations.
   

  

 Excellent written and verbal communication skills
   

  

 Experience with JavaScript and either Angular or React JS frame work is a plus
   

  

 Experience with Oracle Forms is a plus.
   

  

 Agile/ Scrum methodology
   

  

 Shell Programming (C\\-shell, KORN Shell) and PERL
   

  

 This job description is not intended to be an exhaustive list of all duties, responsibilities and qualifications of the job. The employer has the right to revise this job description at any time. You will be evaluated in part based on your performance of the responsibilities and/or tasks listed in this job description. You may be required perform other duties that are not included on this job description. The job description is not a contract for employment, and either you or the employer may terminate employment at any time, for any reason, as per terms and conditions of your employment contract.
   

  

 We are an equal opportunity employer with a commitment to diversity. All individuals, regardless of personal characteristics, are encouraged to apply. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, marital status, pregnancy, religion, physical or mental disability, military or veteran status, genetic information, or any other status protected by applicable state or local law.

title: Software Engineer
description:
Company: GoodSpace AI
 



 Location: Remote
 



 Compensation: ₹12 – 15 LPA
 



 Experience: 1 – 3 years
 



 Type: Full\\-time
 



  





 About GoodSpace AI:
 



 GoodSpace AI is redefining how companies hire. Our AI\\-driven recruitment platform helps founders and HR teams find, evaluate, and hire qualified talent within 24 hours — eliminating the need for endless screening and manual interviews.
 



 We’re a fast\\-growing startup backed by strong technology and passionate people who believe in making hiring 10x faster and smarter.
 



  





 Role Overview:
 



 We’re looking for a Software Engineer to join our core product team and help us build scalable, intelligent systems that power our AI recruitment engine. You’ll work on real problems — from automating candidate evaluation to building AI\\-driven matching pipelines — while contributing to a modern, high\\-performance product stack.
 



  





 Key Responsibilities:
 



 \\-Design, build, and maintain scalable APIs and microservices for our AI hiring platform.
 



 \\-Work closely with product and AI teams to integrate ML/LLM\\-based features into production.
 



 \\-Write clean, efficient, and testable code following best practices.
 



 \\-Optimize system performance and reliability as our user base grows rapidly.
 



 \\-Participate in code reviews, architecture discussions, and feature planning.
 



 \\-Collaborate cross\\-functionally with designers, data scientists, and backend engineers.
 



  





 What You’ll Need:
 



 \\-1–3 years of experience in backend or full\\-stack development.
 



 \\-Strong command of Python, Node.js, or Go (Python preferred).
 



 \\-Experience with RESTful APIs, PostgreSQL/MySQL, and Docker.
 



 \\-Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS/GCP/Azure) and CI/CD pipelines.
 



 \\-Good understanding of data structures, algorithms, and system design.
 



 \\-Bonus: exposure to AI/ML models, FastAPI, or LangChain.
 



  





 Why Join Us:
 



 \\-Work on cutting\\-edge AI\\-driven hiring technology used by top startups and enterprises.
 



 \\-Join a fast\\-paced, product\\-first environment where you can see your impact directly.
 



 \\-Competitive pay, flexibility, and the opportunity to grow with the company.
 



 \\-Collaborate with passionate builders and problem\\-solvers who are transforming hiring.
 



  





 If you love building scalable systems, working with AI technologies, and solving real\\-world challenges — we’d love to meet you.

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
**Company Description** 




 ModernPixel is a software development agency dedicated to creating scalable, user\\-focused digital solutions for businesses and startups. We specialize in developing elegant frontends, robust backends, and high\\-performance products that prioritize quality and impact. Our services include web and mobile app development, custom software, and UI/UX design. With a team of innovative professionals, we deliver clean code, reliable architecture, and efficient iterations to bring ideas to life.
 



  





**Role Description** 




 This is a contract remote role for a Senior Frontend Developer. We’re looking for a Senior Frontend Developer who’s extremely comfortable with React and Next.js, understands scalable frontend architecture, and can take full ownership of features from planning to deployment. You’ll work closely with product, design, and backend teams to build fast, reliable, and visually polished web experiences.
 


**Key Responsibilities** 
* Design and develop high\\-quality, scalable, and maintainable frontend features using
 **React** 
 ,
 **Next.js** 
 , and
 **TypeScript** 
 .
* Architect reusable UI components and ensure strong code structure and predictable state management.
* Collaborate with designers to translate Figma designs into pixel\\-perfect, responsive interfaces.
* Optimize performance across Lighthouse metrics: load, interaction, bundle size, SEO, and accessibility.
* Implement secure client\\-side logic, API integrations, caching strategies, and SSR/ISR/SSG patterns.
* Participate in code reviews and lead best practices across the frontend team.
* Own features end\\-to\\-end — planning, estimation, development, testing, and post\\-release improvements.
* Mentor junior developers and contribute to team\\-level engineering decisions.


**Required Skills** 
* 4–7\\+ years of hands\\-on experience in modern frontend development.
* Deep expertise in
 **React** 
 ,
 **Next.js** 
 ,
 **TypeScript** 
 , and
 **React Query / SWR** 
 .
* Strong understanding of SSR, SSG, ISR, routing, API routes, and app directory.
* Solid grasp of CSS frameworks (TailwindCSS preferred) and component\\-based styling.
* Experience with frontend performance optimization and accessibility standards.
* Familiarity with build tools like Turborepo, Vite, Webpack, or similar.
* Strong debugging skills and ability to work in complex codebases.
* Experience integrating REST and GraphQL APIs.


**Good to Have** 
* Understanding of micro\\-frontends and monorepo structures.
* Experience with state machines (XState), Zustand, Recoil, or Redux Toolkit.
* Exposure to CI/CD pipelines, Docker, or cloud platforms (Vercel/AWS).
* Knowledge of testing tools like Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress, or Playwright.


**What We’re Looking For** 
* Someone who takes ownership and can make architectural decisions confidently.
* Someone who keeps UX in mind while building feature\\-rich interfaces.
* Someone who knows modern frontend patterns and stays updated with the ecosystem.
* Someone who communicates clearly and enjoys solving problems with the team.

description:
This is a remote position.

**Position Title:** 
 Software Developer – Java
   

  

**Experience Required:** 
 3–5 years
   

  

**Location:** 
 \\[Insert Location / Remote / Hybrid]
   

  

**Employment Type:** 
 Full\\-time
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a
 **Java Software Developer** 
 with 4 years of hands\\-on experience in building scalable, high\\-performance applications. The ideal candidate should have strong expertise in
 **Core Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, and RESTful APIs** 
 , along with good problem\\-solving skills and exposure to Agile development practices.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and maintain enterprise\\-grade Java applications.
* Build RESTful APIs and microservices using Spring Boot.
* Implement business logic and data persistence using Hibernate/JPA and SQL.

 Birdeye is the highest\\-rated platform for reputation, social media, and customer experience management for local businesses and brands. Over 150,000 businesses use Birdeye’s AI\\-powered platform to manage online reputation effortlessly, connect with prospects through social media and digital channels, and gain customer experience insights to grow sales and thrive.

title: Principal Software Engineer (8 to 12 yrs)
description:
**Short Description** 




 Building off our Cloud momentum, Oracle has formed a new organization \\- Oracle Health Applications \\& Infrastructure. This team focuses on product development and product strategy for Oracle Health, while building out a complete platform supporting modernized, automated healthcare. This is a net new line of business, constructed with an entrepreneurial spirit that promotes an energetic and creative environment. We are unencumbered and will need your contribution to make it a world\\-class engineering center with the focus on excellence. At Oracle Health, our mission is to improve healthcare and quality of life globally through better experience and easier access to health and research data for patients and healthcare providers.
 



  





 As a Principal Member of Technical Staff in our team, you’ll be responsible to lead efforts in designing and building scalable, distributed, and resilient software components and services to support healthcare platform, applications, and our end users. We believe in ownership and expect you to think long term, mentor, and empower other engineers. You will own the complete SDLC from architecture, development, testing, first class monitoring, to production. As a member of the software engineering division, you will take an active role in the definition and evolution of standard practices and procedures. You will be responsible for defining and developing software for tasks associated with the developing, designing and debugging of software applications or operating systems.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 




 • Lead the design and implementation of next generation of Health Care Applications.
 



 • Develop, maintain, and optimize high\\-quality code to ensure the reliability, scalability, and performance of our software products.
 



 • Participate in architectural discussions and provide technical guidance to ensure the adoption of best practices and alignment with the overall technology roadmap.
 



 • Work closely with product managers to understand requirements, translate them into technical specifications, and deliver features in a timely manner.
 



 • Mentor and provide technical leadership to junior engineers, fostering a collaborative and innovative team environment.
 



 • Participate in code reviews, providing constructive feedback and ensuring code quality and adhering to coding standards
 



  





  





**Required Qualifications** 




 • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
 



 • 7\\+ years of experience in cloud development, architecture, and deployment.
 



 • Strong development experience in Java
 



 • Experience building and maintaining RESTful APIs
 



 • Intimate, working understanding of modern web applications from database to user interface.
 



 • Proficient in object\\-oriented programming and MVC architecture
 



 • Experience with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).
 



 • Experience driving feature design reviews, documentation
 



 • Experience building cloud\\-based platforms that enable application design, development,
 



 testing, and distribution
 



 • Strong communication and interpersonal skills.

Our services include web and mobile app development, custom software, and UI/UX design.  This is a contract remote role for a Senior Backend Developer. We’re looking for a Senior Backend Developer who can own backend architecture, build reliable APIs, and ensure our systems scale smoothly. If you’re strong with Node.js, PostgreSQL, and AWS services, you’ll feel right at home.
 



  




**Key Responsibilities** 
* Design, build, and maintain scalable backend services using
 **Node.js** 
 (Express/Nest/Fastify).
* Architect clean and efficient REST or GraphQL APIs with proper versioning and documentation.
* Work extensively with
 **PostgreSQL** 
 — schema design, indexing, query optimization, migrations.
* Implement caching, rate\\-limiting, background jobs, queues, and event\\-driven workflows.
* Manage deployments and infrastructure on
 **AWS** 
 (EC2, ECS/Lambda, RDS, S3, CloudWatch, IAM).
* Ensure strong security practices: auth, permissions, encryption, and data protection.
* Optimize service performance, reliability, and error monitoring.
* Collaborate closely with frontend, product, and QA to deliver end\\-to\\-end features.
* Conduct code reviews and contribute to backend engineering standards.


**Required Skills** 
* 4–7\\+ years of backend development experience.
* Expert\\-level proficiency in
 **Node.js** 
 , TypeScript, and modern backend frameworks.
* Strong command over
 **PostgreSQL** 
 — complex queries, joins, triggers, indexing, performance tuning.
* Deep understanding of AWS fundamentals — networking, IAM roles, logging, deployments.
* Experience working with ORMs (Prisma/TypeORM/Sequelize) or raw SQL.
* Familiarity with Docker and CI/CD pipelines.
* Solid understanding of distributed systems and API reliability patterns.
* Strong debugging skills with observability tools (CloudWatch, Sentry, Datadog, etc.).


**Good to Have** 
* Experience with microservices or monorepo architectures.
* Knowledge of Redis, RabbitMQ, SQS, or Kafka.
* Experience implementing automated tests (Jest, Supertest, Playwright for API).
* Exposure to infra\\-as\\-code (Terraform/CloudFormation).
* Understanding of security frameworks (OWASP, JWT, OAuth2\\).


**What We’re Looking For** 
* Someone who can think in terms of systems and architecture, not just endpoints.
* Someone comfortable handling scale, performance issues, and production\\-grade deployments.
* Someone who can take ownership, communicate clearly, and mentor others.
* Someone who enjoys solving problems and building reliable backend foundations.

title: Senior Database Developer
description:
**Role Overview**
 We are seeking an experienced
 **Senior Database Developer** 
 with strong expertise in
 **SQL, PL/SQL, PostgreSQL, Data Modeling, ETL development, and Performance Tuning** 
 . The ideal candidate will design, develop, optimize, and maintain scalable database solutions that support enterprise\\-grade applications and analytical workloads. The role involves close collaboration with data engineers, application developers, and business teams to ensure data accuracy, performance, and reliability.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
**Database Development**
* Design, develop, and maintain complex SQL, PL/SQL, and PostgreSQL database objects (tables, views, functions, triggers, procedures).
* Build and optimize ETL pipelines to process large volumes of structured and semi\\-structured data.
* Develop reusable database components and automation scripts.


**Data Modeling**
* Design logical and physical data models, schemas, and data flow structures.
* Ensure data architecture aligns with business requirements and system performance needs.
* Maintain data dictionaries and metadata documentation.


**Integration \\& ETL**
* Implement and optimize ETL/ELT processes using industry best practices.
* Integrate data from multiple sources, including APIs, cloud systems, and legacy databases.
* Ensure data quality, consistency, and compliance during ingestion and transformation.


**Performance Optimization**
* Conduct database tuning, query optimization, and indexing strategies.
* Analyze slow\\-running queries and resolve performance bottlenecks.
* Ensure high availability, scalability, and reliability of database environments.


**Collaboration \\& Support**
* Work with application development teams to support backend database needs.
* Collaborate with data engineering and BI teams for reporting and analytics requirements.
* Perform troubleshooting, root cause analysis, and provide production support when required.


**Required Skills \\& Experience** 
  

  

* 6\\+ years of professional experience as a Database Developer.
* Strong hands\\-on expertise in:
+ SQL and Advanced PL/SQL
+ PostgreSQL development
+ Data Modeling (Entity\\-Relationship diagrams, normalization, schema design)
+ ETL/ELT pipelines and data integration
+ Performance tuning (query optimization, indexing, execution plans)

* Experience handling large datasets and high\\-performance transactional systems.
* Strong knowledge of RDBMS concepts, stored procedures, functions, triggers, and packages.
* Familiarity with data warehousing principles and best practices.
* Exposure to cloud data platforms (Azure, AWS, GCP) is an added advantage.
* Strong analytical, problem\\-solving, and communication skills.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
* Certifications in PostgreSQL, Oracle, SQL, or related database technologies.
* Experience working in Agile/Scrum environments.


 Skills: pl/sql,rdbms,sql,postregresql,data modelling,oracle,performance tuning,elt/etl

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description:
Roles and Responsibilities:
   

  

* Design and implement the lifecycle of services from conception to inception, including system design, build, and deployment
* Develop software solutions to enable operability of large\\-scale distributed systems capable of handling millions of transactions and petabytes of data
* Manage capacity and performance to help scale the infrastructure both on public and private clouds around the world
* Define and implement standards and best practices related to: System Architecture, Deployment, metrics, operational tasks
* Support services through activities such as monitoring availability, system health, and incident response
* Improve system performance, application delivery and efficiency through automation, process refinement, postmortem reviews, and in\\-depth configuration analysis
* Engage in Communications across all areas of the organization
* Troubleshooting and monitoring production systems to ensure the highest uptimes are maintained
* Support and improve upon existing high\\-availability architecture solutions as well as manage the operational activity.
* Integrate Generative AI (GenAI) and AIOps tools to automate incident detection, root cause analysis, and resolution workflows (e.g., self\\-healing scripts, intelligent runbooks), reducing manual toil and accelerating response times.
* Apply Prompt Engineering techniques to enhance interactions with AI\\-based observability and automation platforms improving accuracy and efficiency of AI responses.
* Leverage platform\\-specific AI capabilities (e.g., AWS Bedrock, Azure OpenAI, GCP Vertex AI) to architect intelligent SRE solutions tailored to cloud environments.
* Design, implement, and maintain AI/ML driven monitoring and alerting systems to proactively detect anomalies and predict potential failures, enabling preemptive remediation.
* Develop and train machine learning models using operational telemetry (logs, metrics, events, traces) to support predictive analytics and intelligent automation.
* Evaluate and deploy AIOps platforms (e.g., Moogsoft, Dynatrace, Splunk, BigPanda, Datadog, Elastic) to enhance observability, reduce noise, and accelerate incident resolution.
* Experience in one or more high level programming languages like Python or Ruby or GoLang and familiar with Object Oriented Programming.

title: Technical Lead - Automation Testing
description:
Become a key part of a team crafting the future of gaming at Aristocrat.
   

  

**What You'll Do:\\-** 
* Be a vital member of our online Digital Gaming team, responsible for testing iGaming.
* Design and implement high\\-quality, maintainable automated testing solutions and tools tailored to the needs of various teams.
* Contribute to the technical design for new framework components or tools, ensuring consistency with the overall design and strategy.
* Conduct training sessions to educate team members on standard methodologies for test automation and the use of automation tools.
* Understand the 'big picture' of the automation framework architecture and provide constructive feedback and improvement suggestions.
* Participate in tool selection processes by capturing and prioritizing requirements, and document tool evaluations to meet current and future needs.
* Collaborate with architects and development teams to optimize and improve test automation strategies, processes, and assets to ensure timely delivery of stories and features.
* Champion and consistently improve quality through automated testing.
* Facilitate constructive dialogue with colleagues, demonstrating straight talking, trustworthiness, and openness.
* Work with tech leads, team leads, developers, and testers to devise and deliver innovative solutions for core\\-tech improvements, tooling, processes, and business as usual tasks.
* Use advanced test techniques to build comprehensive test coverage.
* Ensure test coverage and maintainability for test assets in respective areas.
* Apply risk\\-based testing to ensure effective and efficient test coverage.
* Build and distribute clear test execution and defect reports.
* Conduct planning and risk analysis to ensure timely and appropriate testing.
* Apply methodological thinking in the approach to testing and explore products to find vulnerabilities.


**What We're Looking For:\\-** 
* Minimum of 5\\+ years of testing and test automation experience.
* A degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science or Engineering related fields.
* Experience in crafting effective test coverage and selecting appropriate features/test cases for automation.
* Proven track record in training and mentoring others in test automation.
* Solid experience with development languages such as Java, JavaScript, or C\\#.
* Hands\\-on experience with open source test tools like TestNG, Junit, Cucumber (JVM), Appium, WebdriverIO.
* Experience in automating front\\-end (web or native) and back\\-end applications.
* Understanding of delivery life cycles and Agile methodologies.
* Proficiency in Git management tools like GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket.
* Knowledge of proxying and experience using tools like Charles and Postman.
* Experience testing across mobile, tablet, desktop, OS, and browser variations.


 Seeking a dedicated individual with a passion for pushing boundaries in gaming automation.
   

  

 Why Aristocrat?
   

  

 Aristocrat is a world leader in gaming content and technology, and a top\\-tier publisher of free\\-to\\-play mobile games. We deliver great performance for our B2B customers and bring joy to the lives of the millions of people who love to play our casino and mobile games. And while we focus on fun, we never forget our responsibilities. We strive to lead the way in responsible gameplay, and to lift the bar in company governance, employee wellbeing and sustainability. We’re a diverse business united by shared values and an inspiring mission to bring joy to life through the power of play.
   

  

 We aim to create an environment where individual differences are valued, and all employees have the opportunity to realize their potential. We welcome and encourage applications from all people regardless of age, gender, race, ethnicity, cultural background, disability status or LGBTQ\\+ identity. EEO M/F/D/V
 * World Leader in Gaming Entertainment
* Robust benefits package
* Global career opportunities


 Our Values
 * All about the Player
* Talent Unleashed
* Collective Brilliance
* Good Business Good Citizen


**Travel Expectations**
 None
   

  

**Additional Information**
*At this time, we are unable to sponsor work visas for this position. Candidates must be authorized to work in the job posting location for this position on a full\\-time basis without the need for current or future visa sponsorship.*

title: Firmware / Embedded Engineer – Vending Machine Controller Development
description:
Company: Tripundra Industries
   

 Location: Hyderabad (On\\-site Preferred)
   

  

 We are building our own next\\-generation Vending Machine Controller (VMC) and automation platform. We’re looking for a Firmware / Embedded Engineer who can take ownership of real\\-time control systems — motors, sensors, elevator logic, communication modules, and board bring\\-up.
   

  

 This is a high\\-impact role with full freedom to build, innovate, and shape our core hardware product.
   

  

  

 🔍 Responsibilities
   

  

 Develop firmware for custom vending controller boards (ESP32 / STM32 / ARM MCUs).
   

  

 Motor control: DC motors, stepper motors, motor drivers, and conveyor logic.
   

  

 Work on elevator control system (up/down sequence, limit sensors, timing, retries).
   

  

 Interface sensors: IR, opto sensors, limit switches, temperature sensors.
   

  

 Board bring\\-up, debugging, pin mapping, schematics understanding.
   

  

 Implement communication protocols: UART, SPI, I2C, RS485\\.
   

  

 Run prototype testing and machine\\-level validation.
   

  

 Collaborate with backend team for cloud integration (Phase\\-2\\).
   

  

 Document firmware architecture, test cases, wiring diagrams.
   

  

 💡 Requirements
   

  

 1–4 years of experience in Embedded Systems or Firmware Development.
   

  

 Strong knowledge of C/C\\+\\+ for microcontrollers.
   

  

 Experience with ESP32, STM32, ARM Cortex\\-M or similar MCUs.
   

  

 Hands\\-on with FreeRTOS / multitasking environments.
   

  

 Good understanding of PWM, timers, ADC, GPIO configuration.
   

  

 Experience in debugging using multimeter, oscilloscope, logic analyzer (good to have).
   

  

 Ability to work independently on hardware–firmware integration.
   

  

 ⭐ Good to Have
   

  

 Experience working on vending machines, kiosks, automation, robotics, or mechatronics.
   

  

 Worked with communication modules (WiFi, BLE, GSM, Modbus).
   

  

 Experience creating small control boards (motor driver boards, sensor boards).
   

  

  

  

 \\-\\-\\-
   

  

 🎯 Why Join Tripundra?
   

  

 Work on India’s fastest\\-growing smart vending tech ecosystem.
   

  

 End\\-to\\-end ownership of firmware for a hardware product going into 1000\\+ machines.
   

  

 Direct interaction with CTO, mechanical engineers, and product team.
   

  

 Opportunity to lead embedded team as product scales.

title: Sr Technical Lead - .Net Developer
description:
Being part of the team, you will need to be working closely with the development team, Leads, Architects and team QAs daily to develop the framework and features as the business requirements. As you understand the requirements you are encouraged to drive that with the team in terms of further detailing them in Jira Epics/Stories. You will work very closely with the rest of the QA team members and be responsible for ensuring high quality standards of features being developed/delivered.
   

  

**What you will do:** 
* Develop and address new and existing software within time and scope of the integration.
* Perform tests of the applications and apply remediation as needed to eliminate errors.
* Ensures smooth process during third\\-party API integrations.
* Assist in the development and peer review of plans, technical solutions, and related documentation.
* Integration of user\\-facing elements developed by front\\-end developers with server\\-side logic.
* Building reusable code and libraries for future use.
* Optimization of the applications for maximum speed and scalability.
* Implementation of security and data protection.
* Design and implementation of data storage solution.
* Maintain clear communication with immediate manager, with respect to work undertaken and ensure that performance standards/expectations should not get breached.
* Regularly update and consult with direct manager regarding ongoing tasks and projects.
* Provide timely progress reports and seek mentorship as needed to ensure efficient workflow.
* Attend \\& supply to team huddles, meetings \\& ad hoc meetings when required.
* Assist in additional tasks and projects as assigned by supervisors or management to support the achievement of department and organizational goals.


**What we are looking for :** 
* Minimum 5 years of experience in .NET Framework – MVC, Web API, Entity Framework
* Computer Science or Engineering related degree
* Good understanding of the .NET 6 framework and experience in building and maintaining high\\-performance applications using C\\#.
* Understanding of the Mediator Pattern: Ability to work with the Mediator pattern for leading communication between different components, promoting loose coupling and ensuring that each component focuses on a single responsibility.
* Knowledge of CQRS (Command Query Responsibility Segregation): Basic understanding of CQRS principles to separate read and write operations, helping to improve application scalability and organization.
* Good understanding of best coding practices
* Experience in MS\\-SQL Server and Mongo database
* Basic knowledge in front\\-end development with HTML5, JavaScript, CSS, Angular
* Experience in MS\\-SQL Server – Scheme, Stored procedures, trigger, indexes
* Experience in performance tuning of both C\\# code as well as SQL queries
* Experience in Unit\\-Testing development
* Proficiency in examining, investigating and solving multifaceted problems and develop creative solutions
* It would be very effective if you had familiarity with CQRS \\+ DDD (basic knowledge)
* Excellent spoken and written English.


 Why Aristocrat?
   

  

 Aristocrat is a world leader in gaming content and technology, and a top\\-tier publisher of free\\-to\\-play mobile games. We deliver great performance for our B2B customers and bring joy to the lives of the millions of people who love to play our casino and mobile games. And while we focus on fun, we never forget our responsibilities. We strive to lead the way in responsible gameplay, and to lift the bar in company governance, employee wellbeing and sustainability. We’re a diverse business united by shared values and an inspiring mission to bring joy to life through the power of play.
   

  

 We aim to create an environment where individual differences are valued, and all employees have the opportunity to realize their potential. We welcome and encourage applications from all people regardless of age, gender, race, ethnicity, cultural background, disability status or LGBTQ\\+ identity. EEO M/F/D/V
